explanation: The stage direction describes a setting: a library with empty shelves and two characters (Sainte-Beuve and a devil disguised as a student) standing in it. This aligns with the 'setting' category, as it provides the visual and spatial context of the scene rather than describing any character action or interaction.
stgdir: Une bibliothèque dont tous les rayons sont vides ; au milieu, Sainte-Beuve, et à son côté un diable, travesti en étudiant.
